data.name: kstidMissingRgnAbbr
data.value: You must have a region abbreviation if you specify a region name.

data.name: kstidMissingVarAbbr
data.value: You must have a unique variant abbreviation if you specify a variant name. Each variant name must be unique. To edit the variant abbreviation, first edit the variant name.

data.name: kstidError
data.comment: Caption for error messages in dialogs

data.name: kstidDupRgnAbbr
data.value: The region abbreviation you entered is already in use.

data.name: kstidDupVarAbbr
data.value: The variant abbreviation you entered is already in use.

data.name: kstid_None
data.comment: Used in keyboard control (leading space causes it to be first in a sorted list)

data.name: kstid_More
data.comment: Used for a overflow in a list

data.name: kstidVarNameUsed
data.value: The variant name "{0}" is already associated with "{1}", so it cannot be used here.
data.comment: Used in RegionVariantControl

data.name: kstidVarAbbrQuestion
data.value: The variant abbreviation "{0}" was associated with "{1}". Do you want to change "{0}" to refer to "{2}"?

data.name: kstidVarAbbrReserved
data.value: The variant abbreviation "{0}" is reserved for "{1}", so it cannot be used here.

data.name: kstidFeature
data.comment: Substring {0} MUST occur and will be replaced by integer feature number.

data.name: kstidBadLocales
data.value: The following system locales are invalid, so will be omitted from the list of System Languages for keyboard input: {0}
data.comment: Used when filling a list of System keyboards

data.name: kstidBadLanguageName
data.value: FieldWorks is unable to recognize a language name. This item will be omitted from the list of System Languages for keyboard input.

data.name: kstidDefaultSettings
data.comment: Used in writing systems list box

data.name: kstidUnspecified
data.comment: Used in Font combo box

data.comment: Used in Description on the General tab of the Style dialog box

data.name: kstidBorderDetailsWithColor
data.comment: Used in Description on the General tab of the Style dialog box for formatting the Color and point size of the border

data.name: kstidBorderDetailsWithoutColor
data.comment: Used in Description on the General tab of the Style dialog box for formatting the point size of the border

data.name: kstidBottomBorder
data.comment: Used in Description on the General tab of the Style dialog box

data.name: kstidItemSeparator
data.comment: Used in Description on the General tab of the Style dialog box to separate detail items

data.name: kstidItemValueSeparator
data.comment: Used in Description on the General tab of the Style dialog box to separate an item label from its value

data.name: kstidNoBorder
data.comment: Used in Description on the General tab of the Style dialog box

data.name: kstidNoBulletsorNumbering
data.comment: Used in Description on the General tab of the Style dialog box

data.name: kstidTopBorder
data.comment: Used in Description on the General tab of the Style dialog box

data.name: kstidKeymanInitFailed
data.comment: Error message to display if Keyman initialization fails (application may append a colon and specific error details)

data.name: kstidLeadingCheck
data.comment: Used in the Border tab to show leading instead of a simple left or right

data.name: kstidLeftCheck
data.comment: Used in the Border tab to show left instead of leading or trailing

data.name: kstidRightCheck
data.comment: Used in the Border tab to show right instead of leading or trailing

data.name: kstidTrailingCheck
data.comment: Used in the Border tab to show trailing instead of a simple left or right

data.name: kstidSchema
data.comment: Used for bullets/numbers in Description on the General tab of the Style dialog box

data.name: kstidStartAt
data.comment: Used for bullets/numbers in Description on the General tab of the

data.name: kstidTextAfter
data.comment: Used for bullets/numbers in Description on the General tab of the

data.name: kstidTextBefore
data.comment: Used for bullets/numbers in Description on the General tab of the

data.name: ksScriptAbbreviationLength
data.value: The Script Abbreviation must be exactly 4 characters long.

data.name: ksRegionAbbreviationLength
data.value: The Region Abbreviation must be exactly 2 or 3 characters long.

data.name: kstidDupScrAbbr
data.value: The script abbreviation you entered is already in use.

data.name: kstidMissingScrAbbr
data.value: You must have a script abbreviation if you specify a script name.

data.name: kstidInvalidRgnAbbr
data.value: The region abbreviation is invalid. It must be 2 alphabetic characters or 3 numeric characters.

data.name: kstidInvalidScrAbbr
data.value: The script abbreviation is invalid. It must be 4 alphabetic characters.

data.name: kstidInvalidVarAbbr
data.value: The variant abbreviation is invalid. It must consist of alphanumeric characters, possibly with hyphens separating subsections.

data.name: kstidKeyboard
data.comment: Label of combo box in Linux to select a keyboard to use to type a language.

data.name: kstidDuplicateParts
data.value: The writing sytem codes you entered include the code {0} twice. This is not allowed.

data.name: ksBackgroundIsX
data.comment: text background color

data.name: ksListSep
data.comment: separate items in a list (comma space)

data.name: ksLoweredXpt
data.comment: Font lowered by X points

data.name: ksNoColorUnderline
data.comment: nonsense, but a possibility

data.name: ksRaisedXpt
data.comment: Font raised by X points

data.name: ksSingleColorUnderline
data.comment: insert explicit color

data.name: ksTextIsX
data.comment: text foreground color

data.name: ksTextIsXonY
data.comment: text foreground and background colors

data.name: ksXPt
data.comment: size in "points"

data.name: kstidDefaultParaCharsUsage
data.value: The text will get its font properties from the paragraph to which it belongs
data.comment: Usage information for Default Paragraph Characters
